name: MC Raaka Pee
description:
'''Petja Turunen''' (born 19 November 1980), known professionally as '''MC Raaka Pee''', is a Finnish [[Heavy metal music|metal]] vocalist and the co-founder and lead singer of [[Turmion Kätilöt]]. He plays the keyboard and guitar as well. He owns the record label OSASTO-A.

Raaka Pee has a side project named 2 Times Terror that released its debut album in 2010. Raaka Pee is also playing guitar in the music video and debut album for 2 Times Terror.

As Raaka Pee, he has sung backing vocals in [[Tarot (band)|Tarot]]'s album ''Crows Fly Black''. and has been a [[DJ]] as well as [[folk music|folk]], [[humppa]] and [[tango music|tango]] musician. Raaka Pee also did parts of the keyboards for Project Silence's 2010 released song Stardancer (Raven's whore). He also has sung backing vocals for Black Light Discipline and performed shows with them. He has done remixes for [[Ruoska]], Blood and [[Fear of Domination]].

On 7 December 2012, Turunen suffered a serious stroke.
